arts.ttl: Wrexham cruise to 3-0 win with dominant display
arts.sum: Wrexham earned a comfortable 3-0 home win over Exeter City on Saturday, moving the Welsh side up to second place in League One.

arts.ttl: Wrexham climb into second place after easing past Exeter
arts.sum: Max Cleworth, Ollie Palmer and Ollie Rathbone scored for the Welsh side.

arts.ttl: Exeter City wanting to tell their own story against Hollywood Wrexham
arts.sum: “I think the owners, Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney, have done a brilliant job in not just buying a football club and running a football club, they have really invested in the community,” Caldwell said. They are very experienced and have great know-how, their manager (Phil Parkinson) is very similar and knows how to get out of leagues, knows how to win football matches and it’s a brilliant story for them.

arts.ttl: Exeter City's preperation for Wrexham trip affected by snow
arts.sum: This is all part of the job really, you wake up every morning and you never know what’s going to happen and that is one of the parts of the job I love, how you need to adapt, you need to think on your feet and come up with ways to ultimately get the players ready for 3pm on Saturday to win a game of football. “There is no right or wrong way to coach the players and work on the plan for the week, you have to be flexible, you have to adapt to these situations and just get the players ready to win on Saturday.”

arts.ttl: Young Wrexham fan battling cancer receives surprise call from Rob McElhenney after player visit
arts.sum: Archie White got to speak to Wrexham co-owner Rob McElhenney during an unexpected visit from striker Ollie Palmer

arts.ttl: Exeter City Women wanting another Devon Derby win in FA Cup
arts.sum: Perks’ side secured victory over Bridgwater United in the League Cup before routing MK Dons 5-1 at Stadium MK, Charlotte Whitmore (2), Taya Pomfret, Lulu Jarvis and Kathryn Dickson with the goals. A league cup win over Billericay, FA Cup rout of Poole Town and an all-important victory over relegation rivals Gwalia United will give Perks’ side confidence heading into Sunday’s game, despite last weekend’s defeat at home to Cheltenham Town.

arts.ttl: Wrexham fans react to shock Cristiano Ronaldo rumour after coach's tip
arts.sum: Cristiano Ronaldo has been tipped to move to Wrexham by a former Manchester United coach

arts.ttl: Wrexham director confirms club expect to be 'busy' in January transfer window
arts.sum: Wrexham expect to be busy in the upcoming January transfer window as the ambitious Welsh club set their sight firmly on swift promotion to the Championship. Wrexham director Shaun Harvey, a name familiar to the wider footballing world from Welcome to Wrexham, has explained that the Red Dragons will be active in trying to strengthen for both a promotion push and also then surviving/thriving in the next league up as well.

arts.ttl: Preview: Wrexham vs. Exeter City - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Wrexham and Exeter City, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Exeter City youngsters progress in FA Youth Cup and U21 Premier League Cup
arts.sum: “We played some good stuff at times, we talked about licking them out and keeping them in their own half and I thought we did that really well and when the ball came back, we were able to keep it. The Grecians were minus several players that played in last night’s premier League Cup clash at Norwich City, so it was a very youthful Exeter side that took to the field in the Youth Cup.
